record.title: ORDER FOR FIRST READING OF FISA LEGISLATION
record.narrative:
ORDER FOR FIRST READING OF FISA LEGISLATION -- (Senate - August 01, 2007)

[Page: S10680]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that when the majority leader or his designee introduces FISA legislation on August 2, they be considered as having received their first reading on the legislative day of August 1, 2007.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
